array.string: launchctl setenv SSH_HOME kendrick@internest.ddns.net launchctl setenv PUSHOVER_TOKEN ah1aqofa22brhxqdvdes2yzs6wrnbe launchctl setenv PUSHOVER_USER utr5pvzry21gthmo1cb669wr4cpq51 launchctl setenv BACKUP_SRC_DIRS "$(cat ~/.backup_include_list.txt)" launchctl setenv BACKUP_SSH_CONNECTION kendrick@internest.ddns.net launchctl setenv BACKUP_PATH_REMOTE "/mnt/c/Backups" launchctl setenv BACKUP_MACHINE_NAME "$(uname -n)" launchctl setenv BACKUP_EXCLUDE_LIST "/Users/kmarnett/.backup_exclude_list.txt" launchctl setenv BACKUP_ROTATE_PATH "/Users/kmarnett/.dotfiles/bin/backup-rotate"
